headline: Devon Projects $2B in Savings on OBBB, Capex Cuts
summary: Devon Energy expects tax benefits from the One Big Beautiful Bill to generate $1 billion during the next three years and its business optimization plan to bring in another $1 billion of incremental free cash flow.

headline: Devon Energy Corporation (DVN) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Zacks.com users have recently been watching Devon Energy (DVN) quite a bit. Thus, it is worth knowing the facts that could determine the stock's prospects.
